cr.title: 60th Anniversary of Integration of United States Armed Forces
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I rise to lend my voice in recognizing the 60th anniversary of the integration of our Nation's Armed Forces. Having grown up in a military family, my life has been directly impacted and enriched by President Truman's executive order. Though African Americans' history of service and sacrifice did not begin with the integration...
